public class GraphicalObject
extends java.lang.Object

Method Detail

setVisible

public void setVisible(boolean visible)
If true, the spatial become graphically visible. If false, the spatial become graphically invisible.

Parameters:
visible - If true, the spatial become graphically visible. If false, the spatial become graphically invisible.

isVisible

public boolean isVisible()
true if the spatial is graphically visible. False if the spatial is graphically invisible.

Returns:
true if the spatial is graphically visible. False if the spatial is graphically invisible.

destruct

Destruct the object. The object is removed of its node, and of the objects Map.

setScale

public void setScale(com.jme3.math.Vector3f scale)
Scale of the object. With a value of 0.5 the object will be 2 times smaller With a value of 2 the object will be 2 times bigger default value : 1

Parameters:
scale - the new scale
